attributes.action: Department of Work And Pensions to scrap the new expected 90 minute travelling time for persons claiming JSA unless wage can be taken into consideration
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The DPW are threatening to stop claims if persons are not prepared to travel 90 mins away from home on national minimum wage of £5.35ph (of which the NMW is still not a law yet). Transport/travel costs and the inflation of are not taken into account and you could be penalised from claiming JSA.
